description.@en: There was nothing I found to release the demons within my accursed mind quite like the drugs I acquired and constantly imbibed, hoping to salve the injury to my soul. They soothe as nothing else can, and that peace is one I must obtain frequently.

effect.@en: Select any one drug (from earlier in the article); you are now addicted to it. While under its effects, foes must roll two face ‘6s’ on Chaos Dice to Injure you. However, you must use that drug at least once a week, or else be unable to restore your Damage Condition Track until you do.
